answers.answer: How often you test isn't what's important. What's important is recognizing that though you lost weight and got your numbers down (congratulations by the way!) you will always have the tendency to insulin resistance and diabetes. It is important to maintain your healthy weight and continue eating in a more diabetes-friendly way (eliminate sugar and lower carb intake), as well as get regular exercise.
